EmailTemplate.name: Triggered_Nurture_Campaign_Product_Download_Engaged_Technical User/Director.Trig
EmailTemplate.subject: Deliver Greater Performance and Save
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Turbonomic Workload Automation will help you deliver 30% better performance, 30% lower cost, and 30% fewer tickets in 30-minutes or less at {{company.Company Name:default=your organization}}. See for yourself.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]>
Download Turbonomic's 30-Day Free Trial <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/]]> and get the full functionality of our platform for 30 days free.
- Quick install as a single VM on any Hypervisor, Azure, or AWS
- Get placement, sizing, and provisioning decisions based on workload demand - Simultaneously optimize performance, cost, and compliance in real-time
In the first month of using Turbonomic, DXC automated decisions around placement, sizing, and provisioning, saving $1.25M and delivered greater performance to their clients.
All the best, Megan
